text: @realDonaldTrump @WhiteHouse this has literally nothing to do with the lives lost to coronavirus you are trying to change the subject from the fact that over 20,000 people are dead and it is 100% your fault. how does that make you feel? https://t.co/Lr3S5V6AoD
